title: Sampler, mid-17th century
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique:  embroidered in buttonhole, eyelet, herringbone, chain, running, double running, fern, cross and detached looping stitches on plain weave foundation

tombstone.epitaph:
Sampler, mid-17th century.
mid-17th century. Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique:  embroidered in buttonhole, eyelet, herringbone, chain, running, double running, fern, cross and detached looping stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-105.
